pkgmetadata.longdescription: Scrubbing and Other Data Cleaning Routines for fMRI // Data- driven fMRI denoising with projection scrubbing (Pham et al (2022) arXiv:2108.00319). Also includes routines for DVARS (Derivatives VARianceS) (Afyouni and Nichols (2018) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2017.12.098), motion scrubbing (Power et al (2012) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2011.10.018), aCompCor (anatomical Components Correction) (Muschelli et al (2014) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2014.03.028), detrending, and nuisance regression. Projection scrubbing and DVARS are also applicable to other outlier detection tasks involving high-dimensional data.
